title: Camshaft Drive Chain - Inspection

body.body: Visual checks with the camshaft drive chain installed
Check for significant blue discolouration of the drive chain plates that shows excessive heat build-up.
Examine all pins for signs of rotation.
Check for cracking or deep scratching of the drive chain plates.
Check for severe wear of the inner plates as indicated in the diagram below.
Checks with the camshaft drive chain removed
Remove the drive chain from the engine (see
Suspend the drive chain from a pin or hook with a 13 kg weight attached at the lower end.

body.name: Camshaft Chain add 13 kg weight - Inspection cajs

body.body: Measure across 23 links as shown in the diagram below. If the drive chain is within limits, the measurement should be no longer than
indicate that the drive chain must be replaced.

body.name: Camshaft Chain - Inspection 23 link measure cajt

body.body: Check for severe wear of the inner surface of the outer plates at the side-contact points with the sprocket teeth.

body.name: Camshaft Chain - Inspection inner plate wear ccru

body.body: Check for signs of stiffness or kinking.
Check for severe wear of the plates in the area shown below.

body.name: Camshaft Chain - Inspection wear on plate edges caju

body.body: If you find any of these conditions, replace the camshaft drive chain.
